name: HumanPapillomaVirusTests
title: Human Papilloma Virus Tests
description: A value set used in the Office of Population Affairs Title X Family Planning Annual Report (FPAR).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to identify concepts for diagnostic tests for Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) tests.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Observation.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify tests conducted at the point of care, rapid testing, or laboratory tests to detect HPV.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
